1.content:
You were wondering around , trying to find a job, which wasn't easy in Springfield. Then you come across a skyscraper that you for some reason had never noticed in your small town. The sign on front read FREAKY DUCHESS BODY SWAP ENTERPRISES. The name rings a bell to you but you can't seem to place it. ' Mostly rumors and whispers ' you think to yourself. "There is no way that company is real, " you say aloud once you remember where you heard the name from.

You remember reading an article somewhere about a secret corporation that will sell a person another persons life and body for the right price. Even the government had once tried to investigate the owner and founder , the mysterious Freaky Duchess. Nothing was ever found on her though and the investigation was dropped when the special agent claimed there was nothing to see and promptly quit the agency she worked for. " That was just a bad science fiction story... right?" , you say to yourself.

While checking out the front of the building you see a small sign in the corner of the window, HENCHMEN WANTED. Figuring a job is a job you head inside...

Walking in you see a state of the art building, the likes of which belong in a Megacity such as New York or London, not in your small little town. In the middle of the lobby is a central receptionist desk with a short blonde woman typing away at a computer with her back to you. You slowly approach the desk , being distracted by the sheer size and modern style of the large room, and cough trying to attract the ladies attention.

The woman turns around and you are stunned to see Hayden Panettiere working as a receptionist.

http://i.dailymail.co.uk/i/pix/2015/04/2...

" Yo... You... You're Hayden Panetteire !!" you almost ( but not quite) shout with wide eyes.

" Yes I am now aren't I ?" she says back to you with a sparkle in her eye and a big smile on her face, " and you are... ? "

Your choices are ...

Nathan Smith - a 20 yo college student . Caucasian , dark hair , brown eyes. Wants to be a dramatic actor.

Kelsey Cable- 49yo retired Human Resources Director at a local factory. Twice divorced. Two daughters aged 29 and 24. 5' 9" , 118lbs , bottle blonde hair, green eyes. Often called 'Business Barbie' behind your back. Retirement fund pays all her bills, wants some play money and entertainment. Bored of day to day humdrum.

Lynn Akins- 17 yo cheerleader for the local high school. 5'4' 105lbs. , Asian-American. Typical girly girl who still doesn't know what she wants to do with her life, only that she wants out of this town.

Tom Higgins- 35 yo laid off factory worker. Ran out of money and is desperate to find work. 6'0" . 200lbs, fit with red hair and brown eyes.

Megan Johns- 33 yo Married mother of three. Caucasian, dark red-brown hair, blue eyes, 110lbs and 5'7". Has 'mom body' from three children, but very much a MILF. Feels trapped in her life and desperately wants something exciting.
1.title: The application

12.content:
Realizing that you were standing there with your mouth open, you quickly recompose yourself. " I'm sorry about that ," you say, " I am just not used to meeting a celebrity. It's not something that happens everyday to me. My name is Kelsey. Kelsey Cable." you introduced yourself.

" Don't worry about it Ms. Cable. It happens all the time... especially working here." Hayden replies cryptically with a smile. " So what brings you to FDBSE? "

' Something about this place is off ' you think to yourself as you look around the lobby, ' Its like I should know this place, yet somehow a skyscraper you don't remember was built in the small town you had spent your entire life in.' You know your not dreaming, because you can feel the counter under your hand , and the cool air from the air conditioner. At first you thought you should just run away, but your curiosity gets the better of you. Like ' why is there a movie and television star working the receptionist desk ? '

" I'm really not sure ." You answer truthfully. " I was taking a walk through the town and I saw this beautiful skyscraper that I had never seen before and had to find out what it was.

" That's alright Ms. Cable. We get our best customers through walk-ins. Could I ask why you were walking around ? You don't really seem to be in a hurry. " Hayden asked.

" Bored mostly. I retired six months ago, and my children are both out of the house now. I guess I was looking for something to do. I saw the Henchman Wanted sign out front and it made me laugh. That is a rather unique way to advertise a job opening. " You finish with a chuckle.

" Actually that is exactly what we want. " Hayden said, " We have a special hierarchy here , and all department heads are referred to as Henchmen or Henchwomen . Those below them are minions, and the lowest tier are underlings. We believe it helps our workers understand their places in this company. "

" Really? " you replied. " I was a human resource officer at the factory down the road for twenty years, and they would have said that that was demeaning to the workers. There would have been a riot there if we had introduced a command structure like that." you said.

" Well that company can't do the things we do, and I can guarantee that our workers are happy." Hayden retorted cheerfully, like she knew a secret no one else did. " Did you say you were in human resources? As in someone who locates and acquires talent for a company ? Because we are in serious need of a henchman to perform that job here." She added.

" Yes, but like I said I am retired..." you trail off as you notice a group of people wearing lab coats getting off an elevator behind Hayden. One brown haired woman said something to the group, maybe giving out assignments, causing the group to scatter and the head woman stepping onto another elevator. The group was too far away in the giant lobby of the skyscraper to hear what they were saying , but that wasn't what drew your attention. " Is... is that?" you tried to ask, " Is that Pippa Middleton ?" attempting to draw Haydens attention to the woman non- chalantly.

Hayden half turned and answered after looking at he woman. " Yes. That is Dr. Middleton. She is the head of research and development as well as the top henchwoman here." Turning back to you she adds," She is also the vice president of Freaky Duchess Body Swap Enterprise and a certified genius. The Duchess says the company couldn't exist without her."

You were not only astonished at seeing Pippa Middleton, but you had so many questions come to mind when Hayden said those few sentences. " Miss Panetteire... did you say 'BODY SWAP' ? " you asked.

" Yes I did. How do you think this company could afford to have me as a receptionist any other way?" Hayden asks matter-of-factly. " We run a body swap company... but you were about to tell me that you are retired and not interested in the job opening." she said grinning , daring you to walk away after that bombshell.

Quickly you amend your previous statement. " What I meant to say was I am ready to come out of retirement for the right job."

Hayden winked at you and simply said " Good choice. "

" I do have a few questions though. " you say, waiting for Haydens nod to go ahead. " Do all henchmen or women get a new body?"

" Yes. " she states. " You can pick the method, and your new identity... so long as its not already taken by another henchman. Even then you can do as many mutual trades as you want."

" Great... and the Duchess? " you ask. " Is Pippas sister the owner?"

" She is not Kate Middleton, although it was once her body. They call each other 'Sis' , even though neither one was born in the body they wear. Its hard to understand, but there was a rouge A. I. that gave the Duchess the body of Kate Middleton and not her life. It also made her use the name ' Duchess' or 'the Freaky Duchess ' . You'll figure it out eventually. When you finally meet her all you will think is ' I recognize her from somewhere' but not be able to place where. It was some form of reality alteration." Hayden said.

" Does that mean I have the job?" you ask.

"Yes. It does. " Hayden said happily. " I'm going to give you some literature to read tonight and tomorrow we will place you into your new life. Think about how you want to change, from the options listed , and who you want to become. Come back at 7 am tomorrow and we will perform the procedure. See you then."

You took the book from Hayden and turned to leave, attempting to hold back the excitement over getting to pick a new life for yourself. At home that night you decide to use --------- method to become the new-------.

1233.content:
When you got home, you were floating on air. You couldn't believe your luck. By this time tomorrow, you would be a different person. You would be younger and prettier.

Even your first ex-husband, who married some little tart in her twenties, would be impressed. He would be even more than impressed, he would be hot for you. Not that he would know who you were. You mused about seeking your ex-husband with your new body just to screw with his head. You could get him all hot and bothered and then publicly humiliate him. He deserved it.

Your ex-husband reminded you of your children. They wouldn't know you either. After the swap, could you see them? It would be great to be young again, but that didn't mean you wanted to give up your family. This was on your mind when you returned to the office.

In the lobby, Hayden greeted you. "Miss Cable, I'm glad to see you."

"Ummm, I have some questions," you replied.

" I was about to take you to orientation. Hold all your questions until then. They'll be answered there."

" Just one thing.". You didn't want to take the job if you couldn't be a mother and grandmother.

" Don't worry about it. Whatever it is. They'll deal with it."

You followed Hayden through several corridors to a small conference room. When you entered, you saw a pretty middle-aged woman standing in front. She looked a little familiar but you couldn't place her. She was wearing a dark women's business suit with a white blouse and red scarf.

https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/image...

The feeling that you had seen this woman before made you lose your train of thought. Then it occurred to you.

" Aren't you..."

" Yes, well sort of."

" You mean," you said as understanding hit you. Standing before you was the special agent who was supposed to investigate this company. You knew this is a body swap company. You put two and two together and realized what must have happened. The person front of you wasn't the real agent, she is someone who stole the agents body. You became immediately scared.

" Yes, it's what you think," the woman said. She had had this conversation many times before. Continuing she said, " and before you ask, the woman, or should I say man, who used to be me, is now serving five to fifteen years in prison for embezzlement and a host of other crimes."

It was worse then you thought. You didn't know what to do.

Before you could say anything, the woman said, " I hear you have some questions."

123321.content:
You changed out of your business suit into more casual clothing. You decided to relax in front of the TV.

Several hours passed before there was a knock at the door. Through the peephole you saw your next door neighbor Stephanie Dyson. Stephanie was carrying her two year old daughter in her arms.

" Hello Stephanie," you greeted as you let her into your house.

"Hi Kelsey, how have you been?"

" Okay I guess."

You both took a seat on the couch. Stephanie's baby was placed on the floor. The baby looked up curiously at both of you.

" And how did your job interview go?"

" My interview? How did you know about that?"

" I saw you leave your house this morning. I saw you in a business suit. I put two and two together. What else could it be?"

You hadn't known Stephanie as a gossip. But decided she was probably just curious. She was right you hadn't worn business attire since leaving your former job.

" It went well, but I don't think I want to return to work."

" Did they make you an offer?"

" They said they wanted me."

" How much did they offer?"

" They didn't say."

" I'm sure they will offer you a lot of money. A person of your expertise and experience is hard to find. Besides why do you want to stay home all the time just watching television. You should be out doing exciting things and making lots of money."

" I just don't think this is for me."

You continued talking for a while. Stephanie giving reason after reason as to why you should take this job. Although some of her reasons were persuasive you were adamant in your position. After about an hour, Stephanie left your house.

It was only after she left that you realized something was a little wrong. It wasn't just that Stephanie was so insistent that you take this job, but also a few little things.

Stephanie didn't light up a cigarette as she would normally do. It was rare that Stephanie could go an hour without smoking. You are told her she should quit for the sake of her daughter. She said she might but hadn't so far.

Also during the chat, Stephanie's baby sat quietly at your feet. She never once fussed or toddled around the room. At least you didn't think she did.

A couple minutes later, Stephanie was back at your door.

When you answered it, Stephanie said, " I don't know where my head is, I forgot my purse."

It was true. Looking at the couch, where you and Stephanie has been sitting was Stephanie's purse. You retrieved the purse and handed it to Stephanie.

After a while, you decided that Stephanie wasn't acting weird you were just a little on edge. A nice dinner with a little wine, a warm bath and a good night sleep was all you needed.

In the morning, you were feeling refreshed. You decided to put the whole thing behind you. That was until eleven o'clock when a familiar face was at your door. It was the same woman who conducted your orientation. The woman who had supposedly cleared the company after an investigation, the one who was now working for the company.

"Miss Cable, we hadn't heard back from you."

"I'm sorry. But I think I would prefer to stay retired. I wish you all the best. But I'm really not interested."

"Miss Cable, we can help you in ways you could never dream of. Not just what we discussed at orientation. And not the tremendous salary we are offering but there are many other perks."

"Let me just show you."

"Oh alright."

"I have to show you. Come with me."

"We have a nice limousine here to take up. I assure you you will want to see this."

After some more hesitation, you broke down and accompanied her into the limo. Inside the limo a video of playing of celebrities recommending the company.

You were taken to a large dance studio. This being a weekday, it was closed at this time. She ushered you into a theater. In front of you was a large stage. The curtain was down. You took a seat and waited for what was to come next.

"Why are we here?" you asked,

"You'll see."

The lights dimmed and a spot light was trained on the stage. Soon the curtains opened and the spot light moved to stage right. Music started to play. It was a famous piece from the opera of the Marriage of Figaro. You didn't know that was were it was from, but you did recognize the music. In fact, it was part of the ballet scene from that opera. You didn't understand what you were doing here.

Then you saw him, leaping gracefully from off stage. It was your first ex-husband. He was dressed as you had never seen him before. He wore a light pink leotard with a big red heart applique on front and translucent elbow length sleeves. Over the leotard was a knee length ballerina full skirt with a slit that allowed freedom of movement. You could see a petticoat underneath as he leaped and twirled on stage. He wore it with white tights and white pointe shoes.

His beard was gone. You had never seen him without his beard in all the years you had been married nor any of the time since. His lips were painted red, along with reddish blush on his cheeks and neutral tones on his eyes. The last time you saw him he was bald, but he was now obviously wearing a shoulder length wig held in place with a hair band.

He wasn't as practiced as a true ballerina. He was dancing more like a talented girl. Regardless he showed a grace and fluidity of motion that you couldn't imagine him having. Not to mention he would never allow himself to be caught dead in women's clothing.

The recital lasted for about ten minutes before it was over. It ended with a pirouette to a common ballet stance and a feminine bow as if he was listening to applause from the audience. Then he danced himself off stage.

"How did you make him do that?" you asked astonished.

"Well technically that really isn't you ex-husband. Inside his body is an eleven year old girl. She is quite talented. Don't you think?"

"But why did you do this?"

"We know how you feel about him. What a chauvinist he was. We recorded the entire thing. How do you think he'll feel when he's back to normal and we circulate this video to all his friends. Of course, if you like we could arrange that he never gets his former body back again. Whatever you prefer."

1233215.content:
Something was wrong. Something was very wrong. You didn't know what it was, but you had your own problems and didn't want to think about it to much.

A while later there was an urgent knocking at your door. You went to the door and saw two women who you had never seen before. One was a woman in her thirties nicely dressed with brown hair and eyes she looked very distressed. She was the woman knocking. She was holding the hand of an older woman, she was dressed as a woman professional. The woman who was older than you. She had to be in her fifties or early sixties. The other woman was contentedly sucking on a lollipop although it was obvious that she had been crying recently. There was still tear tracks leading down the makeup under her eyes and down her cheeks. There was an odd look in her eyes. She had the wide eyed naive look. It reminded you of what of the look you would see in an infant.

The younger woman seeing you demanded, "Let me in. I have to talk to you."

"Go away before I call the police. I don't know you."

"Yes, you do! Kelsey it's me Stephanie. You know your next door neighbor."

Obviously this wasn't Stephanie. But with what you knew you thought it might be.

"Stephanie???"

"Yes. I know this isn't my body., But it's me and I know you know what I mean."

Kelsey let her in.

"Kelsey, you have to help me. You have to take that job. It you don't I'll have to stay this way," Stephanie yelled.

Stephanie didn't look too bad, but that wasn't the point.

Continuing Stephanie yelled, "If you won't do it for me. Look at Gabby over here. She's only two. Look at what they did to her." Gabriella was Stephanie's two year old daughter. Now apparently she was in the body of a woman nearly sixty years old.

What happens next?

12522311.content:
You decided you wanted to experience some of the action and adventure of the science fiction series Stargate SG-1. You used the remote to jump into the body and life of ...


Your choices are-

Major Samantha Carter USAF- part of the frontline elite special forces team that protests Earth from a parasitic group of snake-like aliens that take humans hosts known as the Goauld. Holds a double doctorate in astrophysics and quantum mechanics. Known to her superiors as Earths greatest natural resource. Always the smartest person in the room.

The Stargate is a device that channels a great amount of power to generate a stable wormhole that connects to another Stargate on another planet, therefore allowing nearly instantaneous travel to other worlds. 12522311.title: Stargate SG-1

125223113.content:
There were so many wonderful ladies in the SGC that you passed on the first two obvious choices and decided to become...

Dr. Carolyn Lam- The second CMO of Stargate Command, Dr. Carolyn Lam is a civilian given the plum appointment by General Jack O'Neill himself. She is General Hank Landry's daughter, and arrived on the base soon after he took command. Their relationship has been strained for years, and she has implied that she might have turned down the job had she been told that Landry would be in charge. Carolyn maintains a relationship with her mother, Kim Lam, from whom the General is separated. As a child her father was often gone, often unable to tell her and her mother about what he was doing, because of his line of work. It's something that drove a wedge between them from a young age, and that Carolyn is only now beginning to understand now that she herself works at a top-secret government facility. After serving with him for two years, Carolyn's relationship with her father was markedly improved.
Lam replaced Dr. Janet Fraiser more than a year after Fraiser's tragic death in the line of duty. * From the Gateworld Omnipedia, Gateworld.net*

https://www.gateworld.net/gallery/displa...

Vala Mal Doran- A thief and a con artist, Vala Mal Doran was an ally of SG-1 before eventually joining the team. She previously made her living trading, stealing, and selling things, and though she provided weapons to shady characters, she was always something of a morally conscious arms dealer. Vala is brash and self-confident, and disguises her true, sensitive character with humor and innuendo. Because of their history together, Vala and Daniel Jackson have a special, love-hate relationship.
Vala was once host to the Goa'uld Qetesh, who ruled over her world. Ten years ago the Tok'ra incited a rebellion there and the Goa'uld was overthrown, according to her story. Vala, as its host, was tortured and beaten by her former subjects. But the Tok'ra took pity on her, as a helpless host, and removed the symbiote and nursed her back to health. *from Gateworld Omnipedia*

http://claudialeeblack.free.fr/galerie/p...
125223113.title: other

1252231133.content:
Perhaps one of the alien races?


The Goa'uld- One of the Milky Way Galaxy's most dominant species for thousands of years, the Goa'uld are serpent parasites that forcibly take human hosts, and possess a thirst for power and worship. They have enslaved countless worlds, using their inhabitants as hosts, soldiers, miners, and personal slaves. * From The Stargate Omnipedia*

The Tok'ra- Though the same species as the Goa'uld, the Tok'ra are a resistance movement who live in voluntary symbiosis with their human hosts -- and thus refuse to be called "Goa'uld" because of their philosophical differences.
More than 2,000 years ago a Goa'uld queen, Egeria, realized what true evil the species was and made a decision to turn against the ways of Ra and the System Lords. All her offspring have genetically inherited the same ideals, and the Tok'ra (literally meaning "Against Ra") movement was born.
The Tok'ra become easily offended if their symbiotic creatures are referred to as Goa'uld, believing that they are vastly different then their Goa'uld brethren. They have been mercilessly hunted by the System Lords since their formation.
The Tok'ra are always on the run, changing the location of their base of operations every few years and operating multiple bases simultaneously. They live in subterranean tunnels they grow from special crystals. Once they arrive on a planet they immediately move underground with these crystals, forging corridors and rooms. This is how they have remained greatly undetected by the System Lords for thousands of years.
Often Tok'ra operatives are sent on missions to infiltrate and subvert the plans of the System Lords. Many Tok'ra spies have been implanted in various Goa'uld groups across the galaxy, rarely being discovered.
The Tok'ra are governed by the Tok'ra High Council. To keep from being entirely wiped out, there is more than one base of operations -- though one base is typically larger than the smaller cells, functioning essentially as a temporary Tok'ra homeworld. Since SG-1 met the group, they have moved to the desert planet Vorash, then to the forested world of Revanna. When the Goa'uld Zipacna (in the service of Anubis) discovered their location and attacked, the entire base was wiped out -- leaving only those Tok'ra in cell bases and away on missions as survivors.
Though the group has sustained many casualties over the years, their determination to wipe the Goa'uld scourge from the face of the galaxy is stronger than ever. Their long-term goal has been to keep the System Lords feuding with one another, so that no one Goa'uld can rise to dominant power. With the development of a symbiote toxin, however, they have begun to act more aggressively, hoping to one day exterminate the Goa'uld completely. * From the Stargate Omnipedia*
1252231133.title: other

12522311331.content:
You decided to become one of the hostile parasites, but which one?

Amonet- Apophis's beloved Goa'uld queen. Amonet possesses the body of Daniel Jackson's wife, Sha're. Jackson and SG-1 searched the galaxy for Sha're for more than two and a half years before she was killed. Teal'c was forced to fire his staff weapon at her, because Amonet was about to kill Jackson.
Amonet and Apophis mated with their hosts and produced a human son, Shifu, who was born on Abydos and hidden away amongst the people. Apophis was convinced that Heru'ur (a rival System Lord) had stolen the child, though Amonet seems to have known the truth and kept it from him.

http://78.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_mdj2w9...

Hathor- The daughter and bride of Ra, Hathor was a Goa'uld queen imprisoned in a sarcophagus in South America for thousands of years. In 1997, she was discovered by a pair of archaeologists, whom she killed before heading for the Stargate -- sensing its hidden location deep within Cheyenne Mountain. She has the ability to breathe an organism that renders men highly susceptible to her suggestion and "drunk" with her beauty -- but the base's women remained unaffected.
After her attempts to take over the S.G.C. and use its personnel as her new Jaffa (servants, warriors and incubators for her a new race of Goa'uld larva she created) was thwarted, Hathor escaped through the gate and continued to build a new army. She enlisted horus and serpent guards, as well as other Goa'uld, luring them from the remote outposts of various System Lords. Hathor's intention was to quietly gather her forces before the System Lords even knew she had been freed from her prison on Earth, in order to move against them.

http://www.thelivingmoon.com/42stargate/...

Nirrti - Treacherous and amoral, the Goa'uld Nirrti was regarded as a goddess of darkness and destruction in ancient Hindu culture. She was once a powerful System Lord, but was cast out by the other System Lords when she nearly threw their relationship with the Asgard into chaos by making a play for Cronus' territory. During a summit at the S.G.C. Nirrti used advanced phase-shift technology to become invisible, allowing her to try and kill Cronus and throw the blame on Teal'c. Instead, Nirrti was apprehended.

http://78.media.tumblr.com/7d2dddfffea18...

Osiris - Banished to Earth for thousands of years, the Goa'uld Osiris was released by a young archaeologist named Sarah Gardner -- who became his new host. He went on to serve the powerful Goa'uld Anubis, a former acquaintance of Osiris', who was poised to conquer the galaxy. Osiris' host is also Daniel Jackson's friend and former girlfriend.
In Egyptian mythology, Osiris was the first Pharaoh of Egypt. His mate and goddess was Isis. Osiris' brother and enemy was Setesh (Seth), who sealed him in a "magic box" (a Goa'uld stasis jar) and, according to the myth, cast him into the Nile River. The Osiris jar was discovered in the twentieth century by the Stewart Expedition.
The ship carrying Osiris away from Egypt sank, and its contents were not salvaged for some 70 years. Finally arriving in Chicago, the Osiris Jar was opened by Gardner -- eager to make an important archaeological discovery that would distinguish her young career. Osiris took her as his new host, and fled Earth in a hidden Goa'uld ship -- promising to return one day with a vengeance.

http://www.zianet.com/jsager/osirus1.jpg...

* All bios copied from the Stargate Omnipedia*

14.content:
"Oh! I'm sorry... my name is Tom. Tom Higgins." you apologize and extend your hand, " I am just not used to meeting celebrities. I love your work." you add.

Hayden giggles and meets your hand with her own and says " Don't worry. It happens all the time. It's something you get used to working here. Is there something I can help you with Tom?"

You couldn't believe you were actually having a conversation with Hayden Paneteirre and she seemed to be flirting with you on top of that! The smile on her face causing you to forget how to speak momentarily. " Work...ah...I wark. " you sputter, " I mean I am looking for work." you finally spit out, feeling like an idiot. Of course your awkwardness only caused Hayden to giggle again.

She suddenly burst out loud laughing and said " I'm sorry, I just had to do that. My day is pretty boring here and I use any excuse to be entertained. I'm sorry I flustered you. Let me be serious for a moment." She straightens her face into one of seriousness. " Are you interested in our henchman position?"

You had actually thought the sign outside was a little joke, but Hayden used the same word. " Ah ... yeah . I guess. I really need a job right now." you say.
" I'm willing to do almost anything. I'm getting desperate." you admit, past the point of pride. Sometimes having no shame is the way to get ahead.

" Tom , you seem like a nice guy. I am not sure you are cut out for what we do here. Maybe I can offer you something else instead. Do you know what we do here?" Hayden asks.

" Uhm ... no. Not really. " you answer , wondering where she was going with this.

" It says it right on the sign outside. We are a bodyswap company. We sell people the bodies and lives that they want for themselves. Would you feel comfortable becoming one of the Duchess' henchmen and basically kidnapping people so one of our customers can steal their body and life? You really don't seem the type." she says seriously and smiles before adding, " You seem too nice for it.

You wonder if she is telling you the truth or if she is just bonkers before she interrupts your thoughts. " How else could a company afford to have Hayden Panettere as a receptionist? " she asks.

After thinking about it you decide to go along , if only to see what is going on. " What else can I do Ma'am. I need a job." you say.

"Could I interest you in a new life?" Hayden asks. You just shook your head and responded with " I don't know how I could pay for it. I'm broke as it is."

" Oh silly. You would pay for it with the job that comes with your new life. Let me show you what we have in stock and you tell me if you still want to be a henchman or you would rather start over as someone else." Hayden stated. " Would that be okay?"

" I am not sure I could steal someone elses' life. " you say .

" Don't worry about that. I was going to show you the bodies we have in storage. They are the ones that our customers have discarded after purchasing a new life. They are unoccupied and just waiting for someone new to claim them." Hayden states.

" That might not be too bad," you say, not seeing any evil in that. " I mean since they didn't want it I may as well have it? " you say.

" Great. Think about it for a minute and let me know if that is what you want or if you would rather be a henchman." Hayden replies.

In the end you choose ...
14.title: Tom Higgens

The idea of you becoming a henchman started to warm up to you. After your boring previous job you wanted to live on the edge and do something exciting that will change each day. You look at Hayden and confidently say , " I want to be a Henchman." Hayden looks back at you and responds , " I admire your confidence , okay , I will give you a chance to be a henchman. " .

Hayden then explains to you the job description. The more she explains the more excited you become. You agree to all the paper work and when you are finish Hayden offer to give you a new body that is more suited for the job description or you can keep your body and meet up with the rest of the crew.

142.content:
" I think I will purchase a new life from your inventory. " You say actually starting to feel pretty good about the idea. " I mean since those people didn't want it anyway." you add.

" Great! " Hayden says with a smile. " I knew there was something we could do for you here. " She says as she calls someone over to watch the front desk. You are amazed to see Olivia Munn come and take over desk duties for her.
" Come on Tom," Hayden says , " let me show you what we have. Don't worry , there are some pretty nice ones here." she adds, helping to alleviate the worries you had. ' After all ' you think, ' How great could those lives be if someone was willing to throw it away?' you ask yourself.

Hayden lead you down a corridor into the guts of the building into a large room with metal and glass capsules. There were hundreds there and it looked like something out of a sci-fi movie. " As you can see , when a person is removed from their body we place it into suspended animation. " Hayden states, " They are stored here until someone else purchases them. Most of them are normal people, that just wanted a change. A lot of them were actually well off and wanted to become celebrities or super rich people. These bodies are the best bargains here as they are just normal and not in high demand. Have a look around and let me know if you see anything you like. "

You wondered around the room looking into each pod , surprised to see that most of them were in fact normal people. You looked in one and see a cute Asian girl that looked like she was just sleeping. In another you see a mid twenties college guy, and another you see a mid thirties MILF. You couldn't believe the technology these people had. Maybe it was possible to swap bodies if they had perfected suspended animation.

" Your telling the truth ..." you accidently say out loud as you come across the one you wanted to be.

" Of course I am silly. Have you found one you like? " Hayden answered.

" Yeah..." you say as you place your hand on the glass portion of the pod ,
" Yeah I have. I'll take this one... " you trail off.

Who did you choose?
142.title: To purchase a new life from the FDBSE inventory

choices: Go check out your new home
1421.content:
" This one." You say looking at the body laying in the pod. " I'll take this one."

" That is an excellent choice Tom. I wouldn't mind being her myself." Hayden says with sincerity. Her name is..."

" Kelsey Cable." You interrupted. " She is the reason I'm here in the first place." you added.

" You know her ?" Hayden asked , genuinely intrigued.

" Yeah, I do. For some time now. She is the woman who fired me from the factory. We worked together for a decade before she called me to her office and said I wasn't showing enough motivation anymore. 'Business Barbie' herself," you state not going into details. " I guess it's fitting that she ruined my life a month before my retirement that I get her life in return." you add while looking in the face of the woman you thought about everyday since. You had convince yourself you hated her and now had a chance at revenge. Then a thought occurred to you "Why is she here... I mean she still has her hundred thousand plus job and a good life that came at the expense of others. Why would she give it up?" you asked.

Hayden looks at the woman in the pod and responds, "I remember her. She came in a few months ago saying she hated her employers for what they forced her to do. How they made her hurt her friends. She said she took the early retirement so as she could and quit that place, but still wasn't happy. So she came here."

" Who did she swap bodies with ?" you ask now feeling guilty for your misplaced hate of the woman.

" I can't tell you that," Hayden said. " but I can tell you that she works for FDBSE as a henchman. She said she wanted to spend her retirement helping people get better lives, and now she is." Hayden turns to you and asks " Have you made your choice?"

" Yes." you stated confidently. " This one. I want this body."

" Okay great. Follow me and by lunch you will have it. " Hayden says and leads you through the room into a side chamber. Inside you see what looks like an operating room and she asks you to lay on the table.

Hayden puts a breathing mask on you and says " I am going to put you into an induced sleep now. Then I will get the Doctor to perform the procedure. When you wake you will be in your new body. Now count backwards from ten for me."

You nod your head and begin counting. " 10..9...8...7...." was as far as you got before the gas overwhelmed you.

You awaken a few hours later feeling lighter. You blink your eyes at the bright lights a few times trying to adjust to the light levels. When you think they are good you turn your head to the side and see Hayden sitting in a chair waiting for you to wake up. " Hayd... " you start and stop when you hear your own voice. " Did it work Hayden?" You ask , even as she stood up and made her way to you. You figure it did since you recognized the voice coming from your mouth. Still it sounded different coming from you.

" Yes it did Tom. How do you feel?" Hayden asked. You thought for a moment to take in the sensations your body was giving you. Aside from the slight jiggling from your chest and the tickling around your neck you felt fine. " Actually I feel pretty good." you say in surprise, still getting used to hearing Kelseys voice coming from your mouth.

" Good, " Hayden said. " The Doctor said the surgery went flawlessly and that you are free to go whenever you are ready. Do you need help getting dressed? The clothes your host left are difficult for an experienced woman to put on, much less a newb."

" I would like that Hayden , thank you." You say as you swing your legs off the bed and stood up. You could see your reflection in the mirror that the company had placed on the wall for customers to inspect their new bodies with.
In the reflection you see a woman that you had known for over a decade looking back at you while wearing a hospital gown. Her green eyes wide, and her blonde hair down. You moved your hand to touch your new hair , looking for a scar, the woman in the mirror doing the same, moving her hand along the edges of her hairline. Soon you slid your hands down the rest of your body, along your face, and stopping to squeeze your c-cup breasts. "Wow, I have her face and boobs." you say aloud even as you fondled you new nipples.

" You've got a lot more than that Honey," you hear Hayden say from the side," you have everything that was Kelsey Cables. You are her as far as the world is concerned."

You had forgotten that you had an audience, and muttered "S...s...sorry." while watching Kelseys face turn red in the mirror.

" Don't be sorry Tom. Everybody does it when they first wake up in their new body. I am used to it. You should have seen what I did !" Hayden says with a chestire grin.

You decide you could explore later and take the gown off , looking at your new and very female form in the mirror. You were tall, around 5'9" and thin, but not bony. " Kelsey took real good care of her body" you state as you turned left, then right , admiring your new flesh.

Hayden soon handed you a pair of French cut panties, and you put them on wordlessly. Next came the bra, which Hayden explained to put on backwards and put your arms through after hooking it and spinning around, you did so attempting to memorize every step. Soon you see a light blue lacy thing that matched the bra. " What is this thing " you ask not really having a clue.

" It's a garter belt. Its used to hold your stockings up." Hayden explains and helps you put it on, followed by the stockings themselves. Hayden showed you how to attach them. She then hands you a light blue blouse and chuckles at you when you can't figure out how to button it. " Most womens clothing are backwards to mens when it comes to buttons and zippers." Hayden states. " The buttons go to the inside." she adds.

Once you figure out how to work the buttons with your light blue painted nails, Hayden hands you a skirt with a slit up to mid thigh on your left leg. She helped you put it on an situate it so the blouse sat just right . Finally came the belt with a large silver belt buckle , and a pair of four inch stiletto pumps. You remembered Kelsey loved to wear high heels to make her already tall frame for a woman taller. She enjoyed towering over most men, and at least being eye level to others.

" How am I going to walk in these? " you ask incredulously as you hold the heels out for Hayden to see. " I've never worn high heels in my life." you add.

Hayden smiles and says " Just try. You might surprise yourself.

You give her an unsure look and try it anyway when she says " Trust me. Try it." with confidence.

You sit the shoes on the floor and are surprised to see your right foot slide into one with no assistance and then the left stocking clad foot do the same. Holding on to the bed you take one tentative step and then another.

" Walk across the room Tom." Hayden commands , and you swallow your fear attempting to do just that. Before you know it you find that you had not only crossed the room and back, but you did so with out a hitch. " H... how can I do that? " you asked.

" Muscle memory and mannerism implant." Hayden answers as you look back at her confused. " You can't be Kelsey if you don't move like her silly. Part of the procedure to swap peoples bodies is to copy the part of the brain that controls muscle memory and mannerisms. " she states matter of factly.

You choose to believe her , mostly because you don't think you would understand any more than the most basic information about it and simply say
" Oh."

Hayden pulls out a small chair from the vanity in the room and tells you to sit down so she can do your makeup. When she is finished you look at your reflection and see Kelsey as she would be on any given day at work. Her hair pulled back in a messy up-do , the streaks of grey and strands of silver only adding to her distinguish. Hayden had applied a light blush and light blue lipstick and eyeshadow to your face. The pearl necklace and earrings making you look exactly like what you are now... a good looking forty nine year old woman.

" I look exactly like her!" you exclaim surprised at the woman reflected back at you. " I am Kelsey now." you state in awe.

" Yes you are. It's the least I could do for you after what I did to you Tom. I'm sorry." Hayden says.

" What are you talki..." you stop when it hits you. " This was your body." You state flatly.

" Yes it was. Its yours now though. I am actually enjoying my new life and will help your enjoy yours too Kelsey. Here are the rest of your things. " Hayden says as she pulls a purse from the rooms closet. " Your new purse containing your drivers license , your cell phone with my number programmed into it if you have any questions, your social security card, and your car keys. "

" You took the purse , not knowing what else to do and ask, " Why would you sell me your body Kelsey?"

" Because I am ashamed of what I did to you. I wanted to make it up to you and when you walked in looking for work I knew how to. I took your life from you, so you are welcome to mine." the former Kelsey said with watery eyes.

" Thank you." you say and wrap the younger, shorter blonde in a tight hug, tears threatening to escape your eyes also. " I am sorry I hated you. I should have known you didn't want to fire me."

After the little emotional scene Hayden shows you the exit and says " I guess this is it Kelsey. I hope you have a good life." as she tells you as you sit in your new Mercedes. It was odd getting in a car new to you and not having to adjust your seat. " What are you going to do first?" she asks.

What will you do?
1421.title: Kelsey Cable, the woman who fired you from the ...

choices: You begin trying on your new clothes
14211.content:
" I think I will go check out my new home." you say as you run your new slim feminine fingers along the curve of the steering wheel.

" I think that is a good idea Kelsey. I've had the neighbor keep the mail checked and your key is under a fake rock by the walkway. Good luck Kelsey and enjoy your new life." Hayden responds.

You roll the window up and smile while waving at her as you drive away, not even noticing that you have kicked off your heels and are driving barefooted. You follow the GPS directions, and soon come to an upscale neighborhood of townhouses built beside the city park. " Wow!" you say out loud as you see your new home for the first time. " She must have paid half a million for that..I mean I must have paid half a million..." you say , just now realizing how much better off you were in Kelseys body than your own. You may have lost a dozen years, but it was worth it to you to be financially stable like Kelsey.

Once you parked in the driveway, you get out of the car after placing your heels back on your small feet and you slowly made your way down the walkway to the front door. You looked around and quickly find the fake rock Hayden mentioned and retrieve the key. Placing it into the lock and turning the key, the door softly swung open into a cool , air conditioned large room , filled with expensive looking furniture. " Welcome to your new life Tom." you said aloud.

When you walked around the room you saw an open doorway that led into a large kitchen, flanked by a large dining room. There was an open bar dividing the two, with a wine rack filled with bottles and names you couldn't pronounce. You place your purse and keys on the counter and decided to get a better feel of the rest of the house. In every room there were things you could not hope to afford in your old life , but it appeared to be chump change to you now. " If all I had to do to get this was become a woman I would have traded bodies with Kelsey a long time ago.." you say as the main stairs caught your eye. " I'll bet my new bedroom is up there. " You say as you grip the banister and proceed to ascend the stairs.

Your eyes open wide once you topped the stairs because the second floor appeared just as expansive and well furnished as the first. Soon you come to an open doorway that had a tastefully decorated bedroom in it. You see a large queen sized bed and several dressers, a makeup vanity with more makeup than you've ever seen. As you begin looking around the room you see two doors. You walk to the first one and open it. Inside you see a massive master bathroom with separate bath and shower, even the toilet was situated in its own little room to the side. " Well I guess I won't have to worry about stinking the whole place up when I take a shit! " you say, and let out a girlish giggle at hearing Kelsey use such language.

You decide to check the other door in the bedroom and see that it is the closet. " Holy Fuck! " you exclaim as you check out your new closet. " This thing is huge. It's bigger than my old bedroom!" you add seeing the size of it. The closet was indeed big, being the size of a mid sized living room in most houses and being divided by four dual upper and lower bar clothing racks that appeared to be organized by season. The tops containing shirts blouses and dresses, and the bottom tier skirts and pants, all separated by color. On the back wall were shoes... any style and color shoes you could think of. It was five layers high and they were separated by heel height , and style. You made your way back towards the shoe rack and you are surprised to see yet another room with a comfortable looking chair , a full length mirror, and a small table next to it, so Kelsey could judge her outfits. " This isn't a closet.. Its a clothing boutique! " you say and then add, " ... and its all mine!"

What next?
14211.title: Go check out your new home

15.content:
" Uhm...Oh! I'm sorry!" You say shaking the surprise off. " I'm Megan Johns." you say while extending your hand. " It's very nice to meet you Miss Panetteire. I'm a big fan." You tell the 'Nashville' star.

" Thank you for saying so. To be honest though it's almost like it wasn't work for me. Like I wasn't really even there." she responds while returning your handshake. " What can we do for you today here at FDBSE?" she asks you.

" I saw the help wanted sign out front and wanted to apply?" you answer her.

Both of Haydens' eyebrows shot up and her mouth formed an 'o' shape before she asked " You want to be a Henchman for us?"

" Yes I guess?" you say a little confused. ' There was that word again.' you think, ' They couldn't actually mean henchman... could they?"

" Yes we mean an actual henchman Miss Johns. " Hayden answers your unasked question. " Don't worry I am not a mind reader. If you only knew how often I get that question."

" Mrs." Megan corrected. " I'm married." you try to say without seeming snobbish.

" My mistake Mrs. Jones. I apologize." Hayden responds.

" Don't worry about it. " You accept her apology. " I wouldn't be doing anything illegal would I?" you ask even as the thought of it exited you.

" That would depend on how you define illegal." Hayden answers with ambiguity that pointed to ' Yes. What we do is highly illegal' without actually saying it. " Would it bother you if it was?"

The thought of a life of excitement within arms length made you giddy. You tried not to let it show as you answered " Depending on what it was ... no it wouldn't."

" In that case , you should know our henchmen have never been caught and it would be impossible to prosecute them if they were." Hayden adds.

You weren't sure how that can be true, but if what little you heard about FDBSE were true , then it could be possible.

" Are you still interested in the job? Do you know what we do here?" Hayden asked.

" I've heard, " you pause thinking about your answer and decide to just go with the truth, " I have heard, and this is just rumor, that you sell people bodies of anyone they wish to be. That if someone has enough money they can become anybody else. Actress, Socialite, their personal rival, or the soccer mom down the street... and if that is true , yes I want the job."

Hayden looks you over one more time and says " Good. Rumors are all we want anyone to hear. Your hired." with a smile.

" Wait that's it. No interview? " you say astounded.

" That was your interview honey. I am a henchwoman too and I am authorized by the Duchess , whom you will meet later, to hire other henchmen. I will call the R and D leader and have her escort you upstairs. The only question is ... who would you be if you could ?"

You thought for a moment and then say " I want to be..."
15.title: Megan Johns

choices: It worked and you wake up in Jennifer Anistons body
It works, but Rolenet awakens too in your old body
It doesn't work and Rolenet escapes
152.content:
You think about it for a moment and say " If I could become anyone I wanted to ," you pause a heartbeat drawing it out a little to make it look like it was a hard choice, " If I could be anyone I wanted to then I would be Jennifer Aniston."

" You are in luck Megan." Hayden says with a smile, " Normally when we hire new henchmen we tell them to come back tomorrow while we collect their new body, but we actually have Jennifer in stock. Of course this procedure may be a little more complicated than normal" she adds.

Her answer both excites and puzzles you. " Why is that ? " you ask.

" A while back we had a problem with a rogue A.I. program. The head of research was actually using Jennifer as her host at the time, but the A.I. took it from her in exchange for another body. Long story short, it caused a little mischief and trapped the Duchess in a body for life before we could contain it. Since then the research leader has taken a new body for herself and has been looking for a way to separate the A.I. from Jennifers body. She is a high value commodity y'know." Hayden explained.

Haydens story gave you cause for concern, that it's possible this was a scam, but you pressed on. " Will it be a problem?" you ask, considering whether or not just leaving.

" Oh no. It won't be. The R and D division has came up with a solution, we were just waiting for someone to request that body. Are you still in?" Hayden clarified.

" Yes of course I am. I am so ready to leave my old life behind. When can we start? " you answer now that your concerns were alleviated.

" Give me just a second to call an escort for you and we can have you in your new body by lunch. " Hayden answered with a smile.

" Okay. " you say, just as Hayden picks up a phone from her desk and asks for ' Dr. Middleton' . You politely attempted not to eavesdrop, but standing three feet from the celeb made that near impossible. When she gets who she is seeking on the line , Hayden states that she has hired a new henchman that is
" willing to replace the RoleNet."

At this point you would give anything to hear the other end of the conversation, but you made do listening to Haydens end of the call. ' RoleNet?' you think to yourself. ' What is the RoleNet?' you ask in your mind. ' Is that the computer A.I. Hayden mentioned earlier?' Your thoughts are brought back to the conversation when Hayden said. " I'm telling you Pippa, this is the one." while she was listening to whatever response the other person gave, your mind wondered to the new question you have.

' Pippa?' you thought to yourself, ' surely that is just a nickname for the Dr. Middleton that Hayden was speaking with. They couldn't actually have Pippa Middleton working here ... could they?' Your thoughts were once again interrupted when Hayden tried to get your attention. " Mrs. Johns? Yoohoo ! Earth to Mrs. Johns."

"Yes, oh I'm sorry, I was... ah.. daydreaming." you say weakly attempting to cover up what you were really thinking about. You were thinking so hard that you had not noticed that Hayden had ended the call and had tried to gain your attention a couple of times already.

" No you weren't. You were trying to piece together information from your eavesdropping. " Hayden prodded cheekily. " It's okay to ask you know. Your gonna find out everything as a henchman at FDBSE." she added.

You figured you were caught so you gave in. " Sorry, I didn't mean to listen in...but.. that person you were talking to , Dr. Middleton." you begin while Hayden looked at you like she not only knew where you were going with the question, she looked like she expected it.

" Yes." she stated calmly.

" Uhm..." you nervously began, knowing how ludicrous it sounded, " that wouldn't be..." you stopped when the elevator directly behind Hayden dinged and the doors opened to reveal the very same person whom you were about to name. Pippa Middleton.

As she approached you with an out stretched hand , she asked " Are you Mrs. Johns. " when you speechlessly nodded yes and stuck your own hand out for her to take she grasped it in a handshake. " It is very nice to meet you Mrs. Johns. I am Dr. Phillipa Middleton , vice president and lead scientist of FDBSE. My friends just call me Pippa though." she said warmly. " I understand you are going to be our new henchman and are willing to replace the Rolenet program as Jennifer Aniston."

You quickly shook the shock of having a once in a lifetime meeting with a celebrity for the second time in fifteen minutes and said " Yes I am. Should I be concerned?" while looking back at Hayden. Turning back to Pippa you add,
" There seems to be a little feeling of anxiousness in the air when someone brings that up." you state. " Almost like no one is sure what will happen."

Pippa smiles and says, " Hayden picked a good one this time. You are very good at reading people. You'll need that in this line of work. " She reaches up and places a hand on your arm and looks you straight in the eyes when she says, " Don't worry Mrs. Johns. Everything will be fine. Everyone here just gets a little nervous when the RoleNet is mentioned. She created a lot of chaos here, and I wouldn't perform the procedure with you if I weren't absolutely certain it would work. No one here has more to fear than myself and the Duchess if she were to get loose again, seeing as we were the ones that trapped her."

Pippas' statement had a calming effect on you and you responded with " Well
okay then ! Let's do this !" excitedly.

" Alright! That's the spirit Megan. Follow me." Pippa says to you before turning to Hayden. " Hold all my calls. You know what can happen if I make a mistake because I was disturbed." sternly.

You followed Pippa into the elevator , where you rode it to the 100th floor, and had to take another one forty-nine more floors up. " This building has a hundred and fifty floors, with the top one being the Duchess' apartment." she states as she steps off and leads you to a lab.

Inside you see various computers and cables hooked up to two pods. One is open while the other is closed. While Pippa is typing away at a computer on the open one you look in the window of the closed one. Inside you see the face of Jennifer Aniston wearing some sort of tech headband, the one you were hoping beyond hope to be wearing soon, seeming to be sleeping peacefully. Pippa spoke up while you peered in at your future form. " That really is a wonderful body, I should know, I wore it myself for a while."

" Why have you not reclaimed it for yourself if you don't mind my asking?" you question her.

" That's okay, its a fair question. Two reasons, first we were scared to mess with the containment of the Rolenet. It is nearly omnipotent . It can change anything... including reality. The Duchess was able to trick it into a suspended animation pod just after it trapped her forever in my sisters body."

" What a minute...Are you saying that Kate Middleton is the Duchess of FDBSE? " you ask incredulously.

"Oh no. The Duchess has her original body though. Thanks to the RoleNet. It gave her that body and then changed reality to make the world think it was always hers. When you finally meet her you won't recognize her but you will have the feeling you should... unless she has used a bodyhopper amulet to body hop someone." Pippa said seeing the confused look on your face. " Its another service we offer here, you'll see soon enough. Now I need you to climb in this pod and place the headband located within on your head." she added.

" How is this going to work ? " you ask even as you follow her orders.

" Since we can't risk waking the Rolenet up, I am going to place your body in suspended animation just like Jennifers, then I am going to use a supercomputer to download your mind into its databanks and then transfer the RoleNet into your body to make room to upload you into Jennifers. For you it will be like you went to sleep and woke up in a new body." Pippa explains.

You put the headband on and say, " Okay. I'm ready." as you accept her explanation and lay back. Pippa presses some buttons and the lid to the pod closes over you, then you feel suddenly feel drowsy , unable to hold your eyes open anymore...

What happens next?
152.title: Jennifer Aniston

1522.content:
Some time later you slowly feel reality coming back to you. You knew you were laying down as you begin to regain consciousness , but not how long you were out or where you were now. Your body senses were telling you that you were no longer in that claustrophobic body swap chamber. Blinking your eyes open you find that you are laying on a cot with a leather mattress in a medium to dim lit room. Gathering your thoughts you try to speak for the first time. " Did it work?" You ask , getting immediate confirmation from the sound of your own voice. " Am I in Jennifer Anistons body now?" you say as you note the differences between your old voice and the new sound your mouth creates. There was a distinct unplaceable Northern accent there as well as a different tone. Growing up in Alabama, you could easily tell this was not the way that Megan Johns should sound.

Once you take a moment to feel the sensations your new body was giving you, including running your tongue around the inside of your new mouth, it becomes very apparent that you are no longer Megan Johns. Sitting up and swinging your feet to the floor, you take notice of the white pants and heels your legs and feet are now wearing. Along with the orange top, and the earrings you now feel dangling from your new ears you know this is not your body.

http://www.biphoo.com/article/wp-content...

You look around the room to try and figure out where exactly you are when you notice that there are small yellow emergency lights flashing yellow from time to time. " What is going on? " you ask , wondering why no one was in the room to explain anything to you when you awoke. There is a mirror hanging on the wall opposite the bed and the woman in the reflection that is matching your movements appears to be Jennifer Aniston, so that is one question answered. " Did something go wrong? It looks like I have her body now, but this is weird waking up alone like this." You tell your reflection.

At that very moment the only door in the room opened , and a very familiar voice answered your question. " That depends on which part of your procedure you are referring to Mrs. Johns."

When you got a look at the person the voice belonged to as she stepped into the room , your jaw would have hit the floor if it was physically capable of it. It was YOU! Or at least it was your body. It took you a moment to recognize that fact, because she was dressed in expensive clothes that you could only dream of being able to afford. She was wearing a dark blue Donna Karen dress, and Christian Louboutin heels. Her hair was different from how you wore yours , done up in a chignon, and her makeup was applied better than you remember the best makeover you ever had. In the 36 years you wore that body , you never looked that good.

Finally able to recover from seeing someone else wearing you better than you ever did, you stood up and walked towards the woman wearing your face and said " Well it appears that you are Mrs. Johns now. Somehow I don't think that was part of the plan." You state as you begin to circle your old body. It felt surreal to talk to yourself in a literal fashion. " What happened? Who are you?" you ask.

" I was Pippa, " your former body starts, " but when I performed the swap the AI awoke before I could put your body into permanent stasis. It wasn't happy about losing that body, or how the Duchess and I defeated it the first time, so it stole mine. She told me that if I wanted to steal her body and give it to some housewife, then it would only be fair for me to become that housewife instead. " she explained.

" Well it seems you have adapted very well. I don't think I have ever looked that nice." you tell her, with a slight bit of jealousy.

" I have no other choice Megan. Rolenet made it so I can't swap bodies again. It seems she wants to punish me." Pippa said, before adding " You should call me Megan from now on Ms. Aniston. After all that's who I am now."

You stared into you own blue eyes for a moment before thinking of something to say, but all you could think of was " I'm sorry." Even then it was said half-heartedly. You had gotten what you wanted , and even though Pippa had been saddled with a life you no longer wanted, you couldn't find much empathy for her. From your understanding Pippa had created the monster known as Rolenet, so it was just a case of her own actions biting her in the butt. Still you knew you shouldn't feel that way.

" Don't worry to much about it Jenn. Its not the first time Rolenet took my body and it may not be the last. " She said before taking your hand and leading you to the cot to have a seat.

You found it amazing that she moved like a woman of high upbringing in your old form , even sitting with her ankles crossed like a socialite like Pippa was. Yet she spoke with a deep South accent as if she had been born and raised in Mobile high society, unlike you did in that body.

" Now I have to tell you that it has been a week since your swap, and that we are only now awakening you because we believe that Rolenet won't come for you. She has too much fun messing with the Duchess and I , and probably wont be back until she thinks she can play her jokes on us for a while." The former Pippa , now Megan said. " In that time I have assumed your life, with some changes to suit me of course. Your husband wasn't happy with me taking a job at FDBSE , an threatened a divorce. " She tells you , actually surprising you. " Don't worry, your children don't know yet. I know you no longer cared for this life, but I also know you do care about your babies. Even though we had intended to sell your body and life to someone who wanted to be a loving mother and wife, I will make sure that they never know their mother left them. I will do my best to make sure they feel your love, even if you aren't their mother anymore."

" That's good to know Megan." you tell her still trying to used to addressing someone else as your former identity, " but there is a reason I left. Yes I do love my babies, but I could no longer be their mother. There was a reason I agreed to this swap in the first place... I wanted out. I know that makes me a terrible person, to want to run away from my children , but it was true. Its your life now... good riddance to it. Who knows maybe that AI did you a favor and gave you something you didn't know you wanted. " You tell your shocked replacement."

" I...I .... don't what to say about that!" said a dumfounded Pippa. She was most likely trying to figure out how a person could possibly feel that way about her life.

" Don't bother Megan, " you say taking glee that you were now Jennifer Aniston, and not some housewife and mother of three anymore. " It's your life now. Do what you want to with it. " you state. " Now do I have an office here or do I just resume Jennifers life?" you ask as you stand up and head toward the door without waiting for an answer.
1522.title: It works, but Rolenet awakens too in your old body

15221.content:
" Well you have an office here." the new Megan responded. " In a way you are resuming Jennifer's life. When I first took that life, I immediately retired from acting and accepted a job here. As far as the world knows 'Jennifer Aniston ' has worked here for quite some time as head of Celebrity Talent Aquisitions." Pippa answered.

" Celebrity Talent Aquisitions... ? What does that mean Megan? " Jennifer asked confused. " How can I already be a department head? " she added.

Megan smiled as she answered, " To put it bluntly Jennifer, you are a world famous actress. Your basically bait to lure other celebrities here so we can steal their bodies. As the current Jennifer Aniston that job belongs to you now. I never really cared for it. My heart is in research and development. Seeing as how I'm Megan Johns now, I also have a body better suited to be behind the scenes. "

Megan pointed to a door across the room and said " There is a change of clothes in the closet. Much better suited for your new position at FDBSE. If you would like to change I can show you where your office is and let you get situated so you can get to work Jennifer."

" I would like that very much ," Jennifer stated. " No better time than now."

" Good . I'll just give you some privacy. When your done I will be outside. " She said as she motioned her head to the door. " Take all the time you need." She added as she crossed the room .

" Okay ." Jennifer answered to the back of her old body, selfishly taking a moment to glance at the retreating figure and take in some of the differences of it and your new body. She still couldn't get over how much more elegant Pippa wears it than she did. As she stepped out and closed the door you noticed something that the new Jennifer commented out load on as soon as the door shut. " Damn. I can't believe I let my ass get so big." While she subconsciously began rubbing her new derriere with both hands. After a beat she added, " Still I was pretty hot for a thirty-five year old mother of three!"

As she began to let her hands roam her stomach and eventually her breasts, grabbing both in her new hands at the same time , the thought occurred to her that she is actually fifteen years older now. " These still feel pretty good for a fifty year old. I wonder if this body had any work done?"

Jennifer crossed over to the door indicated , feeling that she would have plenty of time to explore her new body later, and found a professional looking sleeveless , cream colored dress with a strappy set of silver four inch heels. Also in the bag with the dress were a pearl necklace and earrings, a beautiful gold ring and a silver watch. All of it looked more expensive than a years pay in her old job as a substitute teacher at her kids school in her old life. Megan now Jennifer just touched the items with reverence before shaking the awe out of her head. " It's not even a days pay anymore ! Because I am Jennifer FUCKING Aniston now!" she said with joy as she pulled the items form the closet and carried them to the bed she had awoken in. It didn't take her very long at all to get changed her excitement was so great at the new and exiting life she believed she would be living. This Jennifer wasn't the meek housewife she was in her old life... this Jennifer was going to life her new life to the fullest.

A short time later Jennifer was stepping out into the corridor to find Megan waiting for her. " All set? I thought you might take longer. " she quizzically stated.

" Oh don't worry Megan . I will in due time. I wanna jump into my new life first. " Jennifer responded.

" Well don't take too long on that. " Megan stated. " I know from personal experience how wonderful sexual gratification can be in that body. It is like never ending heaven as long as you can go!" She added with a twinkle in her eyes.

Before Jennifer could parry verbally , Megan became serious . " If you'll follow me , we can get you situated." With a simple nod Megan turned on her heel and lead Jenn down the hallway , past the elevators to a small private elevator.

" This is the only elevator that goes all the way up," Megan said as she pulled a security card from her small purse and swiped it. " It is only used by authorized employees, such as department heads and their assistants. It is the only one that will take you to the floor where your office is located. You are second floor from the top, and will share the floor with myself and two other department heads. The floor above is the Duchess' residence and office. " When the doors opened she stepped in and motioned for you to do the same. " I will make sure your credentials and security clearance is on your desk within the hour. " For the next full minute the two ladies rode silently as the elevator rose.

When the doors opened Jennifer took stock of the corridor and the offices with names on them. Megan lead her down the marble floored executive level and named each office occupant. " That's Stacy Keibler, our body hopper. She is in and out constantly. You may see her real face maybe twice a week." Megan said as Jennifer peered into the window of the suite.

" Um what's a body hopper? " Jennifer asked.

"A bodyhopper is a being that can turn their own body into a goo like liquid that the hopper can force into a host, or what we call a 'Mount'. Normally they are men , but Stacy is special. In her previous life she was a man. When the Duchess began this company she hired all three of us at the same time. I was her 'tech guy' but really I'm more of a mad scientist. I performed a brain transplant on him giving him Stacys body for life. It turned out that the new Stacy was able to retain her powers in her new body." Megan explained.

" The office across from her is Mallika Sherawat. Basically she is a witch , and mistress of the dark arts. She uses spells to swap into and aquire bodies. " Megan stated before showing you her door. " This is me, and that one belongs to you. " she said as she handed you a key. " Go ahead . Check it out."

Jennifer shakily took the key from Megan and opened the door. The room was dark, but she quickly found the light switch beside the door. As she slowly entered what Jennifer saw amazed her. She had a whole corner of the FDBSE tower as her own , and the suite was bigger than the house she lived in when she was Megan. Seeing her deck she strode across the room and tried her new chair out. " Are you saying this is all mine?" she asked unbelieving.

http://jennifer-aniston.org/gallery/disp...

" Yes it is Jennifer. Go ahead and get yourself acquainted while I take care of some business. " Megan said as Jennifer stared out the window , that was much higher than she thought . Jennifer quickly spun around before Megan had a chance to leave. " How high are we exactly?! It looks way up there. Much taller than the building looks on the outside."

" One hundred and ninety-nine stories up Jennifer. I know it is much higher than it looks. I designed it that way, Now I really have other matters to attend to. Check your computer. The password is brainswapped1. One word. " Megan said and quickly exited.

Now what?

155321.content:
Megan thought about her life and how boring it was. She thought this was the best life she could possibly live, having been born as a red headed, blue eyed, White woman. Becoming a housewife and mother was what was expected of her. Sure she could have attempted to be more , but only if she were to thumb her nose at her traditional values family. Her destiny until this point was to basically be a wife who taught Sunday School and raised a family. Sure she was proud of her daughter and two boys and loved Baptist minister husband, but she wanted some excitement in her life and was willing to walk away from it all to get it. Making up her mind that she was going to steal the life of someone of a different race or ethnicity, she looked at Hayden and asked, " Is there a way for me to swap with someone outside of this building?"
